bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Networked Smart Learning Objects for Online Laboratories
IEEE Standard for Networked Smart Learning Objects for Online Laboratories

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Methods for storing, retrieving, and accessing online laboratories as smart and interactive learning objects are defined in this standard. For this purpose, the first level of the standard offers any online laboratory (lab) as a service (Lab as a Service or LaaS). The standard also defines methods for integrating online laboratories as smart learning objects in learning environments and learning object repositories.
